REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1580 reute h f BC-ASTROCOM-<ACOM>-ADDS 03-20 0103

TEXT.TITLE: ASTROCOM <ACOM> ADDS NEW NETWORKING PRODUCTS
TEXT.BODY: Astrocom Corp said it added two new products aimed at improving on-premise data network efficiency. Its ATDM/MS six-port time-division multiplexor is designed to combine and send data from up to 18 remove terminals on a single transmission link to the controller in the central network. The other product, the Squeeziplexor 3074 coaxial multiplexor, is a low-profile version of the company's Squeeziplexor system that allows one coaxial cable to replace up to 32 individual cables connecting terminals and printers to the central controller. Reuter
